name: Devil Diner
description:
Description

Devil Diner is a restaurant management game made in two days for  The Indie Tales Jam. Note that there may be some bugs. Your goal is to take customer orders and give the customers their food in time. If you take too long, the customer will leave and you will not make any money! Play through day after day, and unlock upgrades at the end of each day to help you with future days! Good luck Devil :)

Controls
  • Left mouse button - interaction with objects, menu interaction
Credits
  • Art made by Me ;)
  • Music made with BeepBox
  • Sounds made with BFXR
